Name: Sensory Bin Exploration
Description: Explore different textures in a contained bin
Materials: Plastic bin, Rice/beans/sand, Small toys, Measuring cups
Step 1 Description: Fill a plastic bin with rice, beans, or sand
Step 2 Description: Hide small toys in the material
Step 3 Description: Let child dig, pour, and explore

Name: Finger Painting
Description: Create art using fingers and paint

Name: Play Dough Creation
Materials: Play dough, Rolling pin, Cookie cutters

Name: Wall Push-ups
Description: Push against a wall to provide deep pressure
Step 2 Description: Place hands on wall at shoulder height

Name: Heavy Work Carrying
Description: Carry heavy objects to provide proprioceptive input

Name: Jumping Jacks
Step 1 Description: Stand with feet together, arms down

Name: Animal Walks
Step 2 Description: Walk on hands and feet, belly up

Name: Deep Pressure Hug
Description: Firm hug to provide deep pressure
Step 1 Description: Ask if child wants a hug

Name: Swinging
Description: Swing on playground or indoor swing

Name: Rolling
Description: Roll down a hill or on mat

Name: Visual Tracking
Step 2 Description: Move object slowly in different directions

Name: I Spy
Description: Find objects based on visual clues
Step 1 Description: Pick an object in the room

Name: Scent Exploration
Step 1 Description: Put drops of scent on cotton balls
Step 2 Description: Smell one scent at a time

Name: Body Scan
Description: Notice how different parts of body feel

Name: Chair Push-ups
Description: Push up from chair to provide heavy work
